name: The Ones I Couldn't Save (LucDeligne)
description:
You are the keeper of space light station near a planet. 
As the planet becomes unstable and starts blowing up,
you receive 5 distress signals asking you to warp their ship to safety.
However you can only save a single ship.

You will have to listen to their plea to decide who to help
but you may have to switch constantly between the different channels
as all the signals are broadcasted simultaneously.

Controls :

Use the up / down arrow keys to switch between the 5 channels

In ending cutscene : use space or enter to go to the next dialogue

A game made with GameMakerStudio 1.4
